value:
$WmMPID_水着ガイア,ch04_06_Guire_M_Swim17,Face|$w0|It's...so...hot...
I think my coconut brittle is turning
into coconut syrup.$k$p$WmMPID_水着フレデリク,ch04_16_Frederik_M_Swim17,Face|$w0|I must apologize for my attire.
However, know that I will fulfill
my contract and defend this beach!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Ohh, now this is a nice find! I was
hoping to catch a few guys to round
out my spread!$k$pSay, $Nu...
Let's call this...market research. Do
you prefer the guys or the ladies?$k$pUgh, I'm getting ahead of myself. We
still need to show our power and get
the shots!$k$pFor the order! Well, mostly for our
coffers...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着フレデリク,ch04_16_Frederik_M_Swim17,Face|$w0|I see. It's as Robin predicted. We
shall now retreat in accordance with
her keen strategy.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Not again! Wait right there!
I'm missing so many shots!
Like that angle! And this angle!$k$p$Sbs150|
